name: Hello, fellow humans!
description:
Game developed by Polanski in just 3h for the Trijam#164

Welcome to "Hello, fellow humans!"

Suck the blood of your friendly neighbors to regain energy and transform into a bat when the sun rises!

HOW TO PLAY

Every night, you have to collect an ammount of blood by sucking it from the humans that are walking in the street. If you don't reach the minumum to transform when the sun rises, you will turn into dust and the game will be over.

Each day, the ammount of blood to suck increases by 2.

  • Press SPACE / INTRO when you are near a human to suck their blood!
